SHIPENHANCEMENTS.TORQUE_EXPLOSION.Name: Centrifuge
SHIPENHANCEMENTS.TORQUE_EXPLOSION.Description: Blow up the ship by spinning it too quickly.

SHIPENHANCEMENTS.DEAD_IN_THE_WATER.Name: Dead in the Water
SHIPENHANCEMENTS.DEAD_IN_THE_WATER.Description: Use up all of your ship's fuel and oxygen reserves with no way to refill them.

SHIPENHANCEMENTS.FIRE_HAZARD.Name: Fire Hazard
SHIPENHANCEMENTS.FIRE_HAZARD.Description: Leave a campfire lit inside of the ship for too long.

SHIPENHANCEMENTS.HOW_DID_WE_GET_HERE.Name: How Did We Get Here?
SHIPENHANCEMENTS.HOW_DID_WE_GET_HERE.Description: Have all of the ship's components and hulls be damaged at once.

SHIPENHANCEMENTS.HULK_SMASH.Name: HULK SMASH!
SHIPENHANCEMENTS.HULK_SMASH.Description: Destroy your ship using only your character.

SHIPENHANCEMENTS.RGB_SETUP.Name: Party Time
SHIPENHANCEMENTS.RGB_SETUP.Description: Set all of your ship colors to Rainbow.

SHIPENHANCEMENTS.BLACK_HOLE.Name: The Beginning of the End
SHIPENHANCEMENTS.BLACK_HOLE.Description: Create a very unstable black hole using your ship's reactor.

SHIPENHANCEMENTS.BAD_INTERNET.Name: Thinking Ahead
SHIPENHANCEMENTS.BAD_INTERNET.Description: Land (or crash) your ship on another planet with at least 3 seconds of input latency.

SHIPENHANCEMENTS.SCOUT_LOST_CONNECTION.Name: What Did You Expect?
SHIPENHANCEMENTS.SCOUT_LOST_CONNECTION.Description: Destroy your Little Scout and lose connection with it.
